title: Two sermons preached in the cathedral-church of Bristol, January the 30th 1679/80 and January the 31th 1680/81 being the days of publick humiliation for the execrable murder of King Charles the first / by Samuel Crossman ...
author: Crossman, Samuel, 1624?-1684.
publisher: Printed for Henry Brome, and to be sold by Charles Allen ...,
